data.text: @krdblue Hi, there! We can see that we have already talked to you via DM. Thanks! -N
@RaeAnn39990292 Hi, RaeAnn! Thank you for your input and we will send this to our Planning Team for review! Have a wonderful day! -N
@kahreetoh Hi, there! We apologize for the delay in response but can see that we have already spoken to you via DM. Thanks! -N
@Skeate73 Hi, Ann! Please DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file if you are still needing assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@bluejaytotem Hi, Shelley! If you are in need of assistance, please DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file including what you need assistance with so that we may review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@RyanLaFlare Hi, Ryan! We are working through an unprecedented number of calls and inquiries through all communication platforms and are all responded to in the order received. If you need assistance, please feel free to DM us with your inquiry. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@_IsaiahGreen Hi Isiah! We are so sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a DM with your confirmation number, email address and request. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@ashleyk373 Hi, Ashley! If you are still in need of assistance, please DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@WhoIsLilwill Hi, there! We apologize for the delay in response. If you are still needing assistance, please feel free to DM us with your inquiry including your confirmation number and email on file. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@wheresJCe Hi, there! Please send us a DM with your email address and phone number on file advising that you are unable to locate your reservations. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@kalinb Hi, Kal! Our agents answering all inquiries 24/7 in order received. We apologize for any frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number, email address on file, and your specific request. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -N

@winyourday1 Hi, Jeremy! So sorry for any frustration you experienced! If you ever have issues, we do recommend uninstalling and reinstalling the app to ensure the most up-to-date version! Thank you! -N

@ChadRus15893595 Hi, Chad! So sorry to hear about your bag and we apologize for the delay in response. All inquiries are answered in the order received. Please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address if you still are in need of assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@realizzypresley Hi, there! So sorry for any frustration! Please DM us with your email address and let us know that you are having trouble unsubscribing and we will be happy to assist! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

data.text: @NICKRITZER Hi, there! Allegiant World MasterCards may take up to 14 business days to receive in the mail. If you have not received this, please contact Bank of America for an update. Thanks! -N

@Soupytheeqmgr Hi, Ryan! So sorry to hear of any inconvenience that you and your father-in-law experienced! If you are needing any assistance at this time, please feel free to DM us. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@Cubs4life1981 Hi, Clyde! We do not cash out vouchers. We apologize for any confusion. If you need assistance, please DM us with your specific request for review. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@jennifer_creel Hi, Jennifer! If you are needing assistance please DM us with your confirmation number, email address, and let us know how we can help. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@eek_a_bug Hi, there! So sorry for the delay in response. We know you have probably already traveled but if you need assistance, please feel free to DM us! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@eddiekaboons Hi, Eddie! We apologize for the delay in response. If you need assistance, please feel free to DM us with your email address and confirmation number. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@kungfugwynny Hi, there. We are sorry to hear that he has experienced a flight disruption. If he needs assistance, please have him DM us on his own social media account for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@_baileybarton Hi, Bailey. So sorry to hear you experienced a flight disruption. Please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

urls.title: Terms & Conditions | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Airline Terms & Conditions on credits, refunds, itinerary changes, cancellation, taxes & fees, and no-shows.

data.text: @Lil_Linaaa Hi, there. We apologize for your experience. We are non refundable as agreed to in our terms and conditions that can be viewed here: https://t.co/4piCTDq7Ra We apologize for any confusion. DM us if you have further questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@kmdevma Hi, Karissa. We are sorry to hear of your experience. If you need assistance, please DM us with your confirmation number, email address, and brief description of what happened. Thank you. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@frankieswifey1 Hi, Monica! We are so sorry to hear of your experience. If you would like for us to review further, please DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file with a brief description of the situation. Thank you! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@BWoo22598102 Hi, there! So sorry to hear of your bag! If you still need assistance, please DM us with your confirmation number, email address, and specific issue for further assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@yellowjacket_92 Hi, Jake! We are sorry to hear of your experience. This is not typical, no. We do always recommend that you are at the airport 2 hours prior to departure time though! Please DM us with any additional questions you may have. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@brookejuelch We ask that you refrain from using vulgar language as it violates our Social Media guidelines and will not be tolerated. The airport that you choose to fly to/from is listed on your itinerary. We apologize for any confusion. As stated above, DM us if you need more assistance. -N
@alan_sollis Hi, Alan! Snacks are offered for purchase inflight. We apologize for any confusion! -N

@MingerRebecca Hi, Rebecca. We are experiencing a much higher than normal call volume. If your husband needs assistance, please have him DM us from his own social media account for assistance. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@brookejuelch Hi, there. We are sorry that you feel that way. Check in is done within 24 hours of departure and can be done online or through the app. Agents are available 2 hours prior to departure time. Please DM us if you have additional questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@ChrisSaccoccia Hi, Chris! We will forward your request to our Planning Team for review! -N

@sydmichalangelo Hi, Syd! All routes are current through mid-May 2023. The offered flights will be shown in bold on our online calendar. If a date is not shown in bold after selecting your desired origin and destination, then we are not offering a flight for your route and/or date of interest. -N

@AdamByAir Hi, Adam! All routes are current through mid-May 2023. The offered flights will be shown in bold on our online calendar. If a date is not shown in bold after selecting your desired origin and destination, then we are not offering a flight for your route and/or date of interest.-N

@7deemee Hi, Diane! So sorry to hear of your experience! Feel free to DM us with any specific assistance you may need including your confirmation number and email address on file. Thanks! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

data.text:
After more than 23 years of flying, Allegiant Captain Steve O. flew his last flight and started his retirement in style!  

"We should all be proud of our achievements, no matter the role. Please never forget the foundation that brought you to the present." - Capt. Steve O. https://t.co/fOznm4eDUR
@AdamByAir Hi Adam! At this time we do not have plans to add additional flights into MDW. We are so sorry for the disappointment. - Lupe

@jessablessa27 Hi Jessa, thank you for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry to hear of your experience. If you are needing assistance, please send us a DM with your confirmation number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@Yachts_N_Thots Hi Jessee, thank you for contacting Allegiant. All reservations have our terms and conditions applied. We would not charge additional as we would find the most cost effective option for you within those conditions. Feel free to DM us with any questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@Joe_Dondero Hi Joe, thank you for contacting Allegiant. We are very sorry to hear of your experience. If you are in need of assistance, please feel free to DM us with your itinerary number and email address on file. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@kmarte24 Hi Kat, thank you for contacting Allegiant. Please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -N

@Tms19802 Hi there, thank you for contacting Allegiant. Paynuver reissuing is quite a process and we appreciate your patience. If you have further questions, please feel free to DM us. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

data.text:
@thongbro Hi there, thank you for contacting Allegiant. You can view that info here:  https://t.co/IusYpBFBkp
Please feel free to DM us with any other questions! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -N

@awfullyniceofyu Hi there, thank you for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry to hear of your experience. Please feel free to DM us with your confirmation number and email address on file if you would like us to review your reservation. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -N
@SullivanKimball Hi there, thank you for contacting Allegiant. We will forward to our Planning Team for consideration. Thank you! -N

@HonnorConnor Hi Connor, thanks for contacting Allegiant. Our routes are current through mid May 2023. We continually analyze market trends and base our schedules on a variety of different factors, including airport availability and the demand of routes. DM us here: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@k__renae Hi Kelsey, thank you for contacting Allegiant. Please feel free to DM us if you still need assistance here: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@RomalueK Hi, thanks for contacting Allegiant. We're sorry about your flight disruption as we always try and abide by the schedule we originally plan for. We understand this may interfere with plans you had. Your safety is always a priority.  You can DM us here: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@seekanewerworld Hi Danielle, thank you for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry to hear of your luggage. If you have already filed a claim online, our System Baggage team will get to you. All inquiries are answered in the order received. Thank you so much for your patience! -N
@Kevin_Maas Hi Kevin, thank you for contacting Allegiant. Please feel free to DM us your confirmation number and email address on file if you are still needing assistance. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N

@CarlosD75982197 Hi, Carlos! Thank you for contacting Allegiant. Thanks for the suggestion! We will forward that to our Planning Team for you! Please feel free to DM us if you have any additional questions. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -N
@Holly_Gayle Hi, Holly. Thanks for contacting Allegiant. We can see that you have already been assisted via DM. If you have any other questions, please feel free to write back in. -N

@NormlSummer Hi Lori, thanks for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry to hear that you experienced a flight disruption. If you are needing assistance, please send us a DM providing the email address on file and confirmation number. We will be happy to review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -N

@Tbuck2159 Hi, Tyler. Thank you for contacting Allegiant. No additional compensation is issued for weather related disruptions. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. If you have any other questions, please DM us for review. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC  -Nessa
@JoelSchutte_SEP Please feel free to send us a Direct message. -SW
@JaredBuckendahl Please feel free to send us a Direct message. -SW
@Bethbroo Please feel free to send us a Direct message. -SW

urls.title: Allways Anniversary Giveaway - Allegiant Air
urls.description: Enter for a chance to Win our Allways 1 Year Anniversary Giveaway

data.text:
When's the best time to celebrate? #ALLWAYS, of course, but especially on the first anniversary of our loyalty program, Allways Rewards!

To celebrate, we're giving you a chance to win flights for a year and MORE! Enter now: https://t.co/ejREtvvVBf.

📸: miss_rizzo https://t.co/LoSveXPdcC
